# Graphics Functions Complete reference for Vista Graphics helper functions. ## Drawing Functions - **draw**: Execute drawing commands - **clear**: Clear canvas - **refresh**: Refresh canvas ## Animation Functions - **animate**: Start animation loop - **on-frame**: Frame callback - **stop-animation**: Stop animation ## Utility Functions - **distance**: Calculate distance between points - **angle**: Calculate angle between points - **lerp**: Linear interpolation - **clamp**: Clamp value to range ## Canvas Functions - **canvas-size**: Get canvas dimensions - **resize-canvas**: Resize canvas ## See Also - [API Reference](/wiki/graphics/api-reference/) - All graphics APIs - [Graphics Overview](/wiki/graphics/concepts/graphics-overview/) - Introduction
